name: MIX - SHOT
description:
Description:

Made for https://itch.io/jam/joint-jam-2023  Wield your gun against the horde of the witch as you try to escape an abandoned theme park. Only by making your own uncanny combinations of magic yourself may you shoot your way out.

Controls: 

  • Left Click = Shoot
  • Right Click/Spacebar = Roll/Dodge
  • E = Pickup/Place Objects
  • Esc = Menu
  • Progress Dialogue = Spacebar 
  • Using Menu = 
    • Keys and weapons are equippable simply click on one of these in your inventory then click on the to leftmost inventory slot to equip.
    • To change elemental abilities just click on the relevant one in your inventory.
    • Fire is currently the only elemental ability that can solve puzzles
      • Burn foliage
      • Melt ice
    • To fuse click on more than one element at a time in your menu. Click again to deselect elements.
